Sending email failed, please check email client!
please switch to the phone keypad to use 00

Please manually hung up transferred number
Please switch to the phone keypad to use*6
Download account failed, please add account manually.
Start time can not be less than now
The end time required 5 minutes later than the start time
Delete event time out, try again!
The current account contains schedule meetings, delete the account will delete all meetings associate with it.
Failed to start conference, Please check your network access or conference account or try again
Contact customer service to apply for account

The conference account is not exist, you can not see the history of scheduled meetings

Enter the security code(if it needed) %s and followed by the #

Friendly Reminder

1.First user of BizConf Mobile can search "会畅通讯手机助理" app from APP Store or HiMarket, and then download it.

2.If you access emails through your computer, you will receive a calendar file as an attachment in the email. It includes the conference details of the current conference. Open the calendar file and click Save to add it to your calendar. You will receive a conference reminder before the conference starts.

3.If you have any questions ,please press %s to connect our operator for assistance, or dial 7*24 customer service line 4000621818(within China).

BizConf®Mobile

Version V %s

BizConf Mobile can schedule, join, start and control your conference from your mobile devices easily

©2006-2014 BizConf Telecom Co.,Ltd.All Right Resolved.

BizConf is a globally leading collaboration communication service provider,adhering to the concept of "Comdemunication creates values",dedicated to improving enterprise communication efficiencies and reducing operation costs,and devoted to providing high-quality Audio Conferencing,Web Conferencing,Streaming,Video conferencing and other collaboration communication services.

Customer support
    Tel:+86 21 6026 4111
           4000621818
    E-mail: css@bizconf.cn
